short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to find and disable elements, get and edit text on the webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This product made for testing webpage elements and it has next sections:
1. STRUCTURE - show links, h1-h6 tags, tables, buttons, input fields and can disable images, styles.
2. TOOLS - get links on other useful extensions.
3. GENERATE - generate text, numbers and get length.
4. CHECK LIST - web application checklist.
